PDNC.SettingVisibleHint: Toggles the visibility of the Day/Night clock.
PDNC.SettingTimeOffsetHint: Adjust the clock by this many minutes (positive or negative). Example: 300 for +5 hours, -60 for -1 hour.
PDNC.SettingDayOffsetHint: Adjust the calendar date by this many days. Useful for aligning with other calendar modules.
PDNC.SettingCalendarSystemHint: Select the calendar system to use.
PDNC.SettingPlayerCreateHint: If enabled, players can create Public and Player Notes.
PDNC.SettingPlayerAdvanceHint: If enabled, players see the time control buttons.
PDNC.SettingClockImageHint: Choose a custom image for the clock face. Default: modules/phils-day-night-cycle/assets/clock.webp
PDNC.SettingDbJournalIdHint: ID of the Journal Entry used to store calendar events.
PDNC.Title: Title
PDNC.EmptyDay: The pages of history are blank for this day.
PDNC.TimeMachineHelp: Teleports the entire world to the selected date. Interact with care!
